text: Olivia Anderson – World Stars Mag Meghan Markle looked sunny and chic on Thursday when she attended a reception for the Your Commonwealth Youth Challenge in London with Prince Harry. The Duchess of Sussex wore a bright yellow sleeveless dress by American designer Brandon Maxwell, which could be considered a timely choice given the recent U. S. holiday. The royal accessorized her look with earrings and nude heels. She also tucked her hair into a neat little bun. The ensemble is a stark contrast to the more muted tones Meghan has been wearing since becoming a royal. However, Meghan ’ s wardrobe choices are likely intentional. After all, the duchess has attended many events with Queen Elizabeth II, and Dishaw suspected Meghan aligned her fashion choices for these events to not overshadow the importance of those events or the
